issue.title: When running RVIZ tutorial, there is an issue with the lidar

content.raw:
I tried to add the `joint_state_publisher` to the` localization_example.launch` file, I still get the same warning and a new error stating that the `joint_state_publisher-2` process has died. This is the output when running the localization\_example while running `roscore `and `roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch urdf:=$HOME/my_wamv/my_wamv.urdf`:

```
$ roslaunch wamv_gazebo localization_example.launch
... logging to /home/markus/.ros/log/0af8bb56-886c-11ea-99e4-f40f241b5ede/roslaunch-markus-MacBookPro-3608.log
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take a while.
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server http://markus-MacBookPro:46215/

SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /joint_state_publisher/gui: False
 * /rosdistro: melodic
 * /rosversion: 1.14.5
 * /wamv/rob_st_pub/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/base_link_frame: wamv/base_link
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0: /wamv/sensors/imu...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_config: [False, False, Fa...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_remove_gravitational_acceleration: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/map_frame: map
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0: /wamv/robot_local...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_config: [True, True, True...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/publish_tf: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/sensor_timeout: 2.0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/smooth_lagged_data: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/two_d_mode: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/world_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/broadcast_utm_transform: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/datum: [21.30996, -157.8...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/magnetic_declination_radians: 0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/publish_filtered_gps: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/use_odometry_yaw: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/wait_for_datum: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/yaw_offset: 0

NODES
  /wamv/
    rob_st_pub (robot_state_publisher/robot_state_publisher)
  /wamv/robot_localization/
    ekf_localization (robot_localization/ekf_localization_node)
    navsat_transform_node (robot_localization/navsat_transform_node)
  /
    joint_state_publisher (joint_state_publisher/joint_state_publisher)

ROS_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11311

process[wamv/rob_st_pub-1]: started with pid [3627]
process[joint_state_publisher-2]: started with pid [3628]
process[wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization-3]: started with pid [3629]
process[wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node-4]: started with pid [3634]
[ INFO] [1587981323.418104998]: Waiting for valid clock time...
[ WARN] [1587981323.647490074, 20.148000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 20.147999999999999687
[ WARN] [1587981323.649507771, 20.148000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 20.131333333000000607
[ INFO] [1587981323.654327234, 20.153000000]: Valid clock time received. Starting node.
[ INFO] [1587981323.691482683, 20.181000000]: Datum (latitude, longitude, altitude) is (21.309960, -157.890100, 0.000000)
[ INFO] [1587981323.691555025, 20.181000000]: Datum UTM coordinate is (615116.100362, 2356857.621317)
[ INFO] [1587981323.691606852, 20.181000000]: Initial odometry pose is Origin: (0 0 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ WARN] [1587981323.720440157, 20.200000000]: Could not obtain transform from wamv/imu_wamv_link to wamv/base_link. Error was "wamv/imu_wamv_link" passed to lookupTransform argument source_frame does not exist. 

[ INFO] [1587981323.739643960, 20.212000000]: Corrected for magnetic declination of 0.000000, user-specified offset of 0.000000 and meridian convergence of 0.007041. Transform heading factor is now 0.007041
[ INFO] [1587981323.739717377, 20.212000000]: Transform world frame pose is: Origin: (0 0 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ INFO] [1587981323.739771831, 20.212000000]: World frame->utm transform is Origin: (-631694.38578621379565 -2352468.4624987612478 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, 0, -0.0070405899472914101195)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/joint_state_publisher/joint_state_publisher", line 44, in <module>
    jsp = joint_state_publisher.JointStatePublisher()
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/joint_state_publisher/__init__.py", line 145, in __init__
    raise RuntimeError('The robot_description parameter is required and not set.')
RuntimeError: The robot_description parameter is required and not set.
[joint_state_publisher-2] process has died [pid 3628, exit code 1, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/joint_state_publisher/joint_state_publisher __name:=joint_state_publisher __log:=/home/markus/.ros/log/0af8bb56-886c-11ea-99e4-f40f241b5ede/joint_state_publisher-2.log].
log file: /home/markus/.ros/log/0af8bb56-886c-11ea-99e4-f40f241b5ede/joint_state_publisher-2*.log
[ WARN] [1587981325.862588677, 22.200000000]: Could not obtain transform from wamv/imu_wamv_link to wamv/base_link. Error was "wamv/imu_wamv_link" passed to lookupTransform argument source_frame does not exist. 
```

‌

‌

I get this error several times in the `master.log` file:

```
[rosmaster.master][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:55:27,821: publisherUpdate[/wamv/robot_localization/odometry/filtered] -> http://markus-MacBookPro:40259/ []: sec=0.00, exception=<Fault -1: 'publisherUpdate: unknown method name'>
[rosmaster.threadpool][ERROR] 2020-04-27 11:55:27,822: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/threadpool.py", line 218, in run
    result = cmd(*args)
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/master_api.py", line 210, in publisher_update_task
    ret = xmlrpcapi(api).publisherUpdate('/master', topic, pub_uris)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1243, in __call__
    return self.__send(self.__name, args)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1602, in __request
    verbose=self.__verbose
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1283, in request
    return self.single_request(host, handler, request_body, verbose)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1316, in single_request
    return self.parse_response(response)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1493, in parse_response
    return u.close()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 800, in close
    raise Fault(**self._stack[0])
Fault: <Fault -1: 'publisherUpdate: unknown method name'>
```

‌

‌

And this in the `joint_state_publisher-2.log` file:

```
[rospy.client][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,719: init_node, name[/joint_state_publisher], pid[2517]
[xmlrpc][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,720: XML-RPC server binding to 0.0.0.0:0
[xmlrpc][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,720: Started XML-RPC server [http://markus-MacBookPro:45033/]
[rospy.impl.masterslave][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,720: _ready: http://markus-MacBookPro:45033/
[rospy.init][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,720: ROS Slave URI: [http://markus-MacBookPro:45033/]
[rospy.registration][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,721: Registering with master node http://localhost:11311
[xmlrpc][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,721: xml rpc node: starting XML-RPC server
[rospy.init][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,822: registered with master
[rospy.rosout][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,823: initializing /rosout core topic
[rospy.rosout][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,832: connected to core topic /rosout
[rospy.simtime][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,835: /use_sim_time is not set, will not subscribe to simulated time [/clock] topic
```

edit: layout
content.html:
I tried to add the joint_state_publisher to thelocalization_example.launch file, I still get the same warning and a new error stating that the joint_state_publisher-2 process has died. This is the output when running the localization_example while running roscoreand roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch urdf:=$HOME/my_wamv/my_wamv.urdf:

$ roslaunch wamv_gazebo localization_example.launch
... logging to /home/markus/.ros/log/0af8bb56-886c-11ea-99e4-f40f241b5ede/roslaunch-markus-MacBookPro-3608.log
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take a while.
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server http://markus-MacBookPro:46215/

SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /joint_state_publisher/gui: False
 * /rosdistro: melodic
 * /rosversion: 1.14.5
 * /wamv/rob_st_pub/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/base_link_frame: wamv/base_link
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0: /wamv/sensors/imu...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_config: [False, False, Fa...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/imu0_remove_gravitational_acceleration: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/map_frame: map
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0: /wamv/robot_local...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_config: [True, True, True...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom0_differential: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/odom_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/publish_tf: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/sensor_timeout: 2.0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/smooth_lagged_data: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/two_d_mode: False
 * /wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization/world_frame: wamv/odom
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/broadcast_utm_transform: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/datum: [21.30996, -157.8...
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/frequency: 60
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/magnetic_declination_radians: 0
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/publish_filtered_gps: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/tf_prefix: wamv
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/use_odometry_yaw: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/wait_for_datum: True
 * /wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node/yaw_offset: 0

NODES
  /wamv/
    rob_st_pub (robot_state_publisher/robot_state_publisher)
  /wamv/robot_localization/
    ekf_localization (robot_localization/ekf_localization_node)
    navsat_transform_node (robot_localization/navsat_transform_node)
  /
    joint_state_publisher (joint_state_publisher/joint_state_publisher)

ROS_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11311

process[wamv/rob_st_pub-1]: started with pid [3627]
process[joint_state_publisher-2]: started with pid [3628]
process[wamv/robot_localization/ekf_localization-3]: started with pid [3629]
process[wamv/robot_localization/navsat_transform_node-4]: started with pid [3634]
[ INFO] [1587981323.418104998]: Waiting for valid clock time...
[ WARN] [1587981323.647490074, 20.148000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 20.147999999999999687
[ WARN] [1587981323.649507771, 20.148000000]: Failed to meet update rate! Took 20.131333333000000607
[ INFO] [1587981323.654327234, 20.153000000]: Valid clock time received. Starting node.
[ INFO] [1587981323.691482683, 20.181000000]: Datum (latitude, longitude, altitude) is (21.309960, -157.890100, 0.000000)
[ INFO] [1587981323.691555025, 20.181000000]: Datum UTM coordinate is (615116.100362, 2356857.621317)
[ INFO] [1587981323.691606852, 20.181000000]: Initial odometry pose is Origin: (0 0 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ WARN] [1587981323.720440157, 20.200000000]: Could not obtain transform from wamv/imu_wamv_link to wamv/base_link. Error was "wamv/imu_wamv_link" passed to lookupTransform argument source_frame does not exist. 

[ INFO] [1587981323.739643960, 20.212000000]: Corrected for magnetic declination of 0.000000, user-specified offset of 0.000000 and meridian convergence of 0.007041. Transform heading factor is now 0.007041
[ INFO] [1587981323.739717377, 20.212000000]: Transform world frame pose is: Origin: (0 0 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, -0, 0)

[ INFO] [1587981323.739771831, 20.212000000]: World frame->utm transform is Origin: (-631694.38578621379565 -2352468.4624987612478 0)
Rotation (RPY): (0, 0, -0.0070405899472914101195)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/joint_state_publisher/joint_state_publisher", line 44, in <module>
    jsp = joint_state_publisher.JointStatePublisher()
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/joint_state_publisher/__init__.py", line 145, in __init__
    raise RuntimeError('The robot_description parameter is required and not set.')
RuntimeError: The robot_description parameter is required and not set.
[joint_state_publisher-2] process has died [pid 3628, exit code 1, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/joint_state_publisher/joint_state_publisher __name:=joint_state_publisher __log:=/home/markus/.ros/log/0af8bb56-886c-11ea-99e4-f40f241b5ede/joint_state_publisher-2.log].
log file: /home/markus/.ros/log/0af8bb56-886c-11ea-99e4-f40f241b5ede/joint_state_publisher-2*.log
[ WARN] [1587981325.862588677, 22.200000000]: Could not obtain transform from wamv/imu_wamv_link to wamv/base_link. Error was "wamv/imu_wamv_link" passed to lookupTransform argument source_frame does not exist.

‌

‌

I get this error several times in the master.log file:

[rosmaster.master][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:55:27,821: publisherUpdate[/wamv/robot_localization/odometry/filtered] -> http://markus-MacBookPro:40259/ []: sec=0.00, exception=<Fault -1: 'publisherUpdate: unknown method name'>
[rosmaster.threadpool][ERROR] 2020-04-27 11:55:27,822: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/threadpool.py", line 218, in run
    result = cmd(*args)
  File "/opt/ros/melodic/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/rosmaster/master_api.py", line 210, in publisher_update_task
    ret = xmlrpcapi(api).publisherUpdate('/master', topic, pub_uris)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1243, in __call__
    return self.__send(self.__name, args)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1602, in __request
    verbose=self.__verbose
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1283, in request
    return self.single_request(host, handler, request_body, verbose)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1316, in single_request
    return self.parse_response(response)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 1493, in parse_response
    return u.close()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/xmlrpclib.py", line 800, in close
    raise Fault(**self._stack[0])
Fault: <Fault -1: 'publisherUpdate: unknown method name'>

‌

‌

And this in the joint_state_publisher-2.log file:

[rospy.client][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,719: init_node, name[/joint_state_publisher], pid[2517]
[xmlrpc][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,720: XML-RPC server binding to 0.0.0.0:0

[rospy.registration][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,721: Registering with master node http://localhost:11311
[xmlrpc][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,721: xml rpc node: starting XML-RPC server
[rospy.init][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,822: registered with master
[rospy.rosout][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,823: initializing /rosout core topic
[rospy.rosout][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,832: connected to core topic /rosout
[rospy.simtime][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,835: /use_sim_time is not set, will not subscribe to simulated time [/clock] topic
[rospy.core][INFO] 2020-04-27 11:47:09,851: signal_shutdown [atexit]
